DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability FCM v Standard Care Treating Iron Deficiency Anemia Chronic Kidney Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Male Female 18 85 year age NDDCKD Patients TSAT < /= 25 % Hgb < /= 11.5 Ferritin < /= 300 HDCKD Patients TSAT < /= 30 % Hgb < /= 12 Ferritin < /= 500 Previous participation FCM trial Known Hypersensitivity FCM History anemia anemia due chronic renal failure Current history GI bleeding Received IV Iron within last 30 Days Anticipated need surgery Malignancy history AST ALT great normal Received investigational drug within 30 day screen Pregnant sexually active female willing use effective form birth control
